positions.description: Providing accurate and useful information to the customers, adjudicating immigration and benefits, promoting an awareness and understanding of citizenship, and ensuring the integrity of the immigration system.
positions.title: Immigration Services Officer

positions.description: Managing customer relations and all front of house staff.   Possess understanding of Floor Manager with a hand in every aspect of the restaurant's operation.
positions.title: Restaurant Manager

positions.description: Responsible for the overall business' management, direction, and development. Oversees the business' entire operations including the monthly and annual financial/business planning, general management, quality control, customer service, and marketing. Invested approximately $700,000 in the business. Managed Human Resources practices and objectives that will provide an employee-oriented; high performance that emphasizes empowerment, quality, productivity, and standards; goal attainment, and the recruitment and ongoing development of a superior workforce.  Personally responsible for the development of processes and metrics that support the achievement of the organization's business goals.  Coordinated the implementation of people-related services, policies, and programs through Human Resources staff; and assists and advises company managers about Human Resources issues.
positions.title: Owner

positions.description: Managed and supervised administration, distribution, coordination of company payroll.  Trained personnel in organizational procedures and policies to maintain quality control and efficient management.  Maintained personnel performance by providing thorough training on computer systems to meet and exceed current standards of modernization; distributed benefits to personnel by coordinating activities to ensure prompt and accurate resolution.  Instrumental in reducing errors to improve efficiency, which exceeded the command's average.
positions.title: Assistant Personnel Manager
